snippet.title: Ridgeside Village - Official Stardew Valley Mod Trailer
snippet.description:
Need some more variety in your next Stardew Valley play-through? We have the mod for you!

-----------

What's Ridgeside Village? Ridgeside Village is a massive expansion mod for the game Stardew Valley that spices things up without being too intrusive to the base game. 

Offering quality AND quantity in a bunch of features and content which includes a number of new NPCs that you can befriend and some even romance, new items, fishes, weapons, events, stories, and quests that blend well with the base game's aesthetic and lore, and even late game challenges and rewards. Furthermore, you will be welcomed with the village’s custom-made musical theme and original musical scores unique for every marriageable NPC.

Come and visit Ridgeside Village! Meet new interesting people with immersive backstories, engaging dialogue, and exciting events! Maybe even fall in love? Who knows!? A lot can happen in Ridgeside Village! 

This mod was made by Rafseazz and Mamaesh
Assisted by the Ridgeside Council that formed right after Rafseazz released it as a solo project.

✨DOWNLOAD RIDGESIDE VILLAGE ON NEXUS MODS: https://www.nexusmods.com/stardewvalley/mods/7286
💬JOIN THE DISCORD: https://discord.gg/ridgesidevillage
🐦FOLLOW THE MOD ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/RidgesideVilla
🗣️JOIN RIDGESIDE REDDIT DISCUSSION: https://www.reddit.com/r/RidgesideVillage
❤️SUPPORT THE MOD: https://www.patreon.com/rafseazz

VIDEO BY POMPOMEROY: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLq9JQMKAkmeE95E27h0UWg

MUSIC BY RAFSEAZZ, RSV MOD CREATOR
